---
Not sure if this is in the USA or not. But I do know the grocery stores in my towns are closing hours earlier and they claim it’s for new “disinfecting” policies and procedures that take hours for them to complete each night. Don’t be surprised when we have an upswing of transverse myelitis (aka polio), GBS and similar chemical induced neurological disorders.

Pick up homesteading, organic gardening, holistic healing, herbalism, “let food be thy medicine” and learn to cultivate the land. It’s really the only way to protect your families now.
